text.0: .@AmPress is essential reading for everything #Election2020 -- community information and news needs won't vanish after tomorrow. Ground your reporting in how your community participates in democracy --> https://t.co/nzOuBAijho
text.1:
What would #ElectionDay coverage look like if we didn't focus solely on politics or politicians, but on citizens and how they participate in democracy?

Learn how 3 journalists are helping to redefine the elections beat and how you can do the same: https://t.co/gkr9wzfmCP
text.2: Honored and humbled to be collaborating w @freep @firstdraftnews @AmPress to distribute this voter guide in Arabic, Bengali, Spanish and English! Currently in Hamtramck passing out printed guides to local businesses #Vote2020 https://t.co/4OfbSLcUWs
text.3:
As you obsess in advance of tomorrow's elections, I recommend watching two recent @AmPress conversations with @AP officials about understanding results:

1. How and when the AP Decision Desk declares winners of a race: https://t.co/loWqV3xVtM
